plot: A haunted doll house may endanger a family who believes voodoo is keeping them safe, and Melinda searches for her missing wedding rings.

When Lucy Stanton comes looking for a doll fitting the replica of her home made as doll-house, Melinda learns that her pre-teen daughter Drew hears voices in it and notices self-arrangement at night. It's the ghosts of her family, who perished from accidental asphyxiation there, and suspect her aunt Emma Silber of murderous methods to get their considerable inheritance. Eli enjoys meeting fellow occult scholar Zoe Ramos, who explains about the voodo.—KGF Vissers
